root.name: Monster Truck Madness 64
root.description: Monster Truck Madness 64 is the Nintendo 64 port of the PC game, Monster Truck Madness, released in 1999. Around the time of it's release, it received much advertisement on World Championship Wrestling programming and featured trucks styled after some of the WCW wrestles. In one commercial spot, WCW wrestler Kevin Nash made an appearance.
